text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text:
Oh man～, this year's Appreciation Festival was on another level～！ 
Hey, the student over there！ Do your best next year too～！

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: You got it！ Thank you very much！

text_block_list.name: Seeking the Pearl
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for today, Bamboo. 
I ended up asking for your help all of a sudden.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Oh, if it's about that, you don't need to worry about it！

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
Never expected that I'd be asked 『Do you still have your 
Captain's uniform from last year?』 with that timing. The phone 
call caught me by surprise.

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
To think you'd be in that big of a hurry to get in contact with me…… 
you were worried about King this whole time, weren't you？

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text:
……Oh, Nature, good work！ I heard about it from 
Pearl-senpai. That you took charge when it came 
to reorganizing the shift assignments！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Hee！？ No, no, that was something that anyone could do. 
Besides……

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member A
text_block_list.text:
Captain～～！This year's Appreciation Festival, 
it was the best, wasn't it！！

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Member B
text_block_list.text:
Let's throw a party with everyone! 
Are you good at karaoke!?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
……probably, at that moment, everyone in the squad wanted to do 
their best together with the captain.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
(After the Fan Appreciation Festival was over, everyone in the 
Cheer Squad returned to their normal everyday life. And the days 
of being subject to the captain's whims came to an end, but――)

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Unbelieveable, Sky-san！ 
Next time, I won't let you get away with it！！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, King. Seems like you're being given 
the run around by her flightiness～

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Nature-san. 
……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
What about you？ Aren't your competitions with Teio-san heating up too？ 
I heard about it from everyone in the shopping district.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ugh……those old ladies are really talkative, huh？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, if you need someone to practice with, don't hesitate to ask. 
I'll help you out anytime.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
In that case, how about joining me for coffee every once in a while？ 
Even just listening to me complain is fine.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
And, at the same time I can show my appreciation to the now 
former Captain who worked so hard. If you need any parallel 
running training, I can help.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Oh！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Should we head to a cafe？ 
Or would you rather head to the Shopping District？

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Either is fine～. We could even head to a vending machine that 
sells that sweet red-bean drinkー.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
(……King and I, for just a little while longer, continued our 
association from the squad)
